record.title: COMMITTEE FUNDING RESOLUTION
record.chair: The pending business is the vote on adoption of House Resolution 202, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 131, I was in a hearing during votes. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
